footer.description: Serving the people with dedication and commitment.

hero.title: A Journey from Booth Karyakarta to MLA
hero.subtitle: Dedicated to serving the people

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To serve the people with dedication and work towards the development of our constituency

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: A prosperous and developed constituency where every citizen thrives

road.title: Road Development
road.description: Construction of new roads connecting remote villages

water.title: Water Supply
water.description: Installation of water supply systems in rural areas

education.title: Education Infrastructure
education.description: Building new schools and upgrading existing facilities

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.empty: No upcoming events at the moment.

impact.label: Impact
impact.description: Journey from a polling booth worker to Union Home Minister, driven by people-first governance and relentless dedication.

peoplesPerson.title: People's Person
peoplesPerson.description: 10 years as an elected representative serving people as MLA, Rajya Sabha MP, and Lok Sabha MP.

facilitator.title: Facilitator of Change
facilitator.description: Eight years as a Minister in the Gujarat Government with exemplary work at the Union Ministry of Home and Cooperation.

contributor.title: Contributor in Nation Building
contributor.description: A firm believer in Indian culture and ethos with an unwavering focus on national development.

organizationBuilder.title: Organization Builder
organizationBuilder.description: Led the BJP for six years as National President, expanding it into the world's largest political party.

sportsAdministrator.title: Sports Administrator
sportsAdministrator.description: Instrumental in taking cricket and chess in Gujarat to new heights with world-class infrastructure.

cooperativePioneer.title: Cooperative Pioneer
cooperativePioneer.description: Brought the cooperative movement to the forefront of Gujarat's economy and national discourse.

milestone1.title: Grassroots Leader
milestone1.description: Started at the polling booth level, organizing karyakartas and voter outreach.
highlights: Built strong connect with local communities

milestone2.title: Minister, Gujarat
milestone2.description: Served eight impactful years in the Gujarat cabinet, driving governance reforms.

milestone3.title: National President, BJP
milestone3.description: Reimagined the party's organization, expanding it into the world's largest.

milestone4.title: Sports Visionary
milestone4.description: Elevated cricket and chess in Gujarat with professional infrastructure.

milestone5.title: Union Home Minister
milestone5.description: Led nationally significant decisions with a people-first mindset.
highlights: Brought cooperative ethos to the centre

milestone6.title: Nation Builder
milestone6.description: Focused on empowerment, cooperative growth, and cultural renaissance.

profile.heading: Representative Profile
profile.name: Manish Rawat
profile.description: A dedicated public servant committed to the development and welfare of the constituency. Working tirelessly to address the needs of the people and bring about positive change.
